code_value: Taobao is now used by many people every day. Whether the entire online shopping market is healthy or not has become very important. A healthy market environment refers not only to the quality of the goods themselves, but also operatorsâ€™ development state of this market. Taobao provides good services to the sellers, so the sellers can provide a good service to buyers, and then the buyers can in turn continue to promote the development of Taobao. An environment like this is necessary to maintain the healthy development of the online shopping market. Even with such rapid growth, the online shopping market still has some problems such as credit card fraud and ID theft.
